net.uniform.html

Class HTMLForm

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.uniform.impl.AbstractForm
      • net.uniform.html.HTMLForm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Form

    public class HTMLForm
extends AbstractForm
    Default HTML form implementation. Adds a few details to the AbstractForm:
    • Adds LabelDecorator as a default decorator for all elements of any class
    • Adds ElementErrorsDecorator as a default decorator for all elements of any class
    • Adds FormErrorsDecorator to the top of the form
    • Encloses rendered elements in the HTML <form> tag and sets its attributes
    Author:
    Eduardo Ramos
